response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value to you at $15,000, I propose we strike a deal that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair profit for me. I am offering the product to you for $14,000. This price not only allows you to acquire an asset valued at $15,000 but also secures a significant saving compared to the market rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14000}
